Functions

class TGmpPool (T)
 GMP object pool template.

Detailed Description

GMP memory management routines and object pools.

Initializes gmp to use D's garbage collection memory management and defines a template for managing pools of gmp objects for high performance loops.

Function Documentation

class TGmpPool (  T   ) 
 

GMP object pool template.

Each gmp class has two object pools. One pool is a list of recycled objects. Another is a list of temporary objects that have been created as the result of an operation inside of a begin/end section. See the mpz class, for example, for typical usage of the mpz pool.

Allocate an object from either D's allocator or reuse an object that had been previously put in recycling.

Returns:
the allocated or recycled object
Put an object in the recycling pool.

Parameters:
val the object to put in recycling
Clear pool. Releases references to any allocated objects.
